Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.factory

Class DynamicListQueryAdapter<T,Q,VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH>
androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter<T,VH>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicListAdapter<T,VH>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.factory.DynamicListQueryAdapter<T,Q,VH>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the lists this adapter will receive.
Q - The type of the query this adapter will receive.
VH - The type of the recycler view holder.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filterable
public abstract class DynamicListQueryAdapter<T,Q,VH extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder> extends DynamicListAdapter<T,VH> implements Filterable
A DynamicListAdapter to handle the generic data with query.
